subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Evan Longoria hit his third career grand slam to help build the Tampa Bay Rays’ lead, but J. P. Arencibia hit a two-out, two-run homer in the ninth inning to lift the Blue Jays.
snippet: Evan Longoria hit his third career grand slam to help build the Tampa Bay Rays’ lead, but J. P. Arencibia hit a two-out, two-run homer in the ninth inning to lift the Blue Jays.
